bike.description: Full high modulus carbon main frame, stays and bell crank, Omniad M30 lay-up, 100mm travel mp4 linkage design, Press Fit 30 bottom bracket, 12 x 142 rear thru-axle dropouts, SST size-specific tube diameters, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, asymmetrical chainstays, stainless steel chain stay protector, cartridge bearing pivots, Rock Shox Monarch XX shock with hydraulic Xloc remote lock-out and 10mm hardware, replaceable derailleur hanger, Maxle rear axle

components.description: Rock Shox SID XX 29 with 15mm Maxle Lite thru-axle, tapered alloy steerer, external rebound, lock-out via hydraulic Xloc remote, Solo Air spring, motion control damping, 32mm stanchions, magnesium lowers, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
American Classic Tubeless 29 Disc with AC130 15mm front & AC 225 12x142 rear hubs, AC butted spokes & alloy nipples
SRAM X0 mid cage rear and X9 34.9mm dual pull front
Ritchey Pro 2B OS, 31.6 x 400mm, with alloy clamp
Avid Elixir 7 hydraulic disc brakes with 180mm front & 160mm rear HSX rotors
